name: Project:Solace
description:
You arrive on an island as Sophie. She and six other individuals have joined a survival competition show. However, things are not what they seem. Sophie and the other contestants must fight to survive, discover the secrets of the island, and escape.

A 2D sidescroller with RPG, platformer, and permadeath elements.

  • 6 playable characters each with a unique perk.
  • Upgrade your weapon and armor and equip enhancements to aide you in your survival.
  • Level progression has permadeath; survive the island with at least one character alive.
  • Find secrets and discover the true horrors of the island
